short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Saves a file with one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clicking this extension will download an image from an image-only page into a specific folder & auto-closes the tab afterwards.

Available options:
- You can change the folder name Hopploader saves the images in located in your downloads folder.

Created by Affension Team
